adverb.description: Coal Mining. In a direction parallel to that of the main cleavage of the coal (the cleat). Now historical and rare.

adjective.description: Coal Mining. Designating a passage driven in a direction parallel to that of the main cleavage of the coal (the cleat); of or relating to a headway. Formerly frequently in "headways course". Now historical.

origin: Late 17th century (in an earlier sense). From head + -ways.
